A certificate of occupancy for change in non-residential Occupancy Group shall not be required under the following conditions:
1. The gross building floor area does not exceed 2,000 square feet per floor; and
2. The part of the building changed requires no substantial increase in live loads; and
3. The part of the building changed requires no increase in occupant load, or the occupant load for the new use does not exceed 100 persons.
